Package com.ibm.service

Interface TimeTableService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeTableServiceImpl
public interface TimeTableService
Service interface for managing movie time tables.

  • Method Details

    • save

      int save(TimeTable t) throws TimeTableAlreadyExistException
      Saves a movie time table.
      Parameters:
      t - the time table to be saved
      Returns:
      the ID of the saved time table
      Throws:
      TimeTableAlreadyExistException - if a time table with the same ID already exists

    • update

      int update(TimeTable t) throws TimeTableNotFoundException
      Updates a movie time table.
      Parameters:
      t - the time table to be updated
      Returns:
      the ID of the updated time table
      Throws:
      TimeTableNotFoundException - if the time table with the given ID is not found

    • searchById

      TimeTable searchById(int id) throws TimeTableNotFoundException
      Searches for a movie time table by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the time table to search for
      Returns:
      the found TimeTable entity
      Throws:
      TimeTableNotFoundException - if the time table with the given ID is not found

    • searchByDateAndScreen

      TimeTable searchByDateAndScreen(TimeTableRequest ttr) throws ScreenNotFoundException, TimeTableNotFoundException
      Searches for a movie time table by date and screen.
      Parameters:
      ttr - the TimeTableRequest object containing the date and screen information
      Returns:
      the found TimeTable entity
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen with the given ID is not found
      TimeTableNotFoundException - if the time table for the given date and screen is not found

    • searchByShow

      TimeTable searchByShow(int id)
      Searches for a movie time table by show ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the show to search for
      Returns:
      the found TimeTable entity

    • list

      List<TimeTable> list()
      Retrieves a list of all movie time tables.
      Returns:
      a list of TimeTable entities

    • listByScreenId

      List<TimeTable> listByScreenId(int id) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of movie time tables for a given screen ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the screen to search for time tables
      Returns:
      a list of TimeTable entities associated with the given screen ID
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen with the given ID is not found

    • listByScreenName

      List<TimeTable> listByScreenName(String name) throws ScreenNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of movie time tables for a given screen name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the screen to search for time tables
      Returns:
      a list of TimeTable entities associated with the given screen name
      Throws:
      ScreenNotFoundException - if the screen with the given name is not found

    • listByDate

      List<TimeTable> listByDate(Date d)
      Retrieves a list of movie time tables for a given date.
      Parameters:
      d - the date to search for time tables
      Returns:
      a list of TimeTable entities associated with the given date

    • removeById

      Boolean removeById(int id)
      Removes a movie time table by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the time table to remove
      Returns:
      true if the time table was successfully removed, false otherwise
